queries.sqlQuery: select concat( '', personName, '' ) Name, Country, count(*) Apperances from ( select personName, personId, average, countryId Country from Results r where eventId = '333' and average > 0 order by average limit 100 ) r group by personName, personId, Country order by Apperances desc

select concat( '', personName, '' ) Name, Country, count(*) Apperances from ( select * from ( select personName, personId, value1 result, countryId Country from Results where eventId = '333' and value1 > 0 union all select personName, personId, value2 result, countryId Country from Results where eventId = '333' and value2 > 0 union all select personName, personId, value3 result, countryId Country from Results where eventId = '333' and value3 > 0 union all select personName, personId, value4 result, countryId Country from Results where eventId = '333' and value4 > 0 union all select personName, personId, value5 result, countryId Country from Results where eventId = '333' and value5 > 0 ) r order by result limit 100 ) final group by personName, personId, Country order by Apperances desc
